activities: To subscribe to our software solution, a customer will need to provide the following information during the on-line enrollment process: name, company name, email and optionally a phone number. Should a customer choose to subscribe to our service after the trial period, a phone number, e-mail address, mail address and credit card information (for billing) will be gathered. We do not store, process or transact credit card information on our servers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer - personal data is to be processed by our application and the payment gateway. All of this is done automatically unless there is a failure in the system. At that point, we would process manually.
recoursemech: JAMS International Mediation Rules; EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for organization human resources data only
